Name: ORIX!
About the game: ORIX! - a puzzle game - where you need to find the right path and get to the yellow cube. Features: Simple controls (W,A,S,D or arrows) Pleasant music. Over 10+ levels. Credits: Programming: AFBIK Studio Music and effects: zapsplat
